meanings.definition: A unit of data equal to 1,000,000 bits.
meanings.sent1: I downloaded a movie that was 800 megabits in size.
meanings.sent2: My internet plan offers a speed of 100 megabits per second.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel stored over a million megabits of acorn data in its nest.
meanings.sent4: Her brain processed information at a rate of megabits during the exam.
meanings.sent5: The hard drive could store megabits of information, making it very efficient.

meanings.definition: A unit of data transfer rate equal to one million bits per second.
meanings.sent1: The new fiber optic connection provides a speed of 500 megabits.
meanings.sent2: Streaming services require a minimum of 10 megabits for smooth playback.
meanings.sent3: The race car's engine roared like a thousand megabits per second.
meanings.sent4: Her words flowed out of her mouth at a rate of megabits, leaving everyone amazed.
meanings.sent5: The information highway moved at a speed of megabits, connecting the world seamlessly.
